prompts: Street-level photograph of a mature {genus} tree on a residential street, showing distinctive bark texture and branch structure characteristic of the species, clear daylight, trees casting shadows on pavement and lawn
Google Street View angle photograph of a {genus} tree in front yard, close enough to see leaf shape, size and arrangement details on branches, rough concrete sidewalk and green grass background
Urban street photograph featuring a {genus} tree growing from sidewalk planter or yard, full view of canopy shape and foliage density, asphalt street and buildings in soft focus background
Suburban residential photograph of a {genus} tree with focus on trunk diameter, bark pattern, and crown structure, houses and landscaping blurred in background, bright natural lighting
Close-up street view of {genus} tree leaves and small branches, showing characteristic leaf morphology, color, texture and arrangement for the genus, depth of field keeps trunk visible
Wide street photography of {genus} tree showing overall form and size relative to nearby houses and utility lines, typical suburban tree setup with grass and sidewalk
Detailed photograph of {genus} tree bark texture and trunk characteristics, lower branches visible with full foliage, street and yard context visible around base
Street-level view of {genus} tree in spring or bloom period if applicable, showing flowers or emerging leaves, residential setting with driveway or street visible
Photograph of mature {genus} tree showing seasonal characteristics - fall colors, or evergreen foliage, or fruiting structures visible in canopy, street and neighbors blurred
Google Maps Street View style photograph of {genus} tree positioned as a prominent street tree, full height visible in frame, showing natural growing form, shadows indicating time of day
